thread.title: Robert van Kooten
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Robert van Kooten

author: Robert van Kooten
title: Robert van Kooten
text: The site constantly tries to sneak additional things into your basket that cost extra. Even after checking everything carefully and unticking everything that was extra, I noticed that the total on the payment page was Â£0.50 more than previous pages had stated. At this point I couldn't be bothered going back and risking losing everything I'd filled out in the forms.
